channel.title: Code on Food 4 Thought
channel.description: Recent content in Code on Food 4 Thought

item.title: Configuration
item.description: Here are some helpful tips for setting up this theme. Syntax Highlighting Ananke theme allows the use of Hugo’s rich built-in syntax highlighting capabilities. See Syntax Highlighting in the Hugo docs. Below is an example configuration for Highlight. See Highlight in the Hugo docs for more. [markup] [markup.highlight] codeFences = true guessSyntax = false hl_Lines = "" lineNoStart = 1 lineNos = false lineNumbersInTable = true noClasses = true # For styles, see https://xyproto.
